remarks: "Associative" law for inner product.  Conjugate version of ~ dipassr . (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipass.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipass.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ipass.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipassr2 $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A P ( ( * ` B ) S C ) ) = ( B x. ( A P C ) ) ) $.
